1250.quoteText: This Privacy Notice was posted on May 1, 2015. It is effective upon acceptance for new users, and from June 15, 2015 for all other users. See previous version of this Privacy Notice.
1250.title: eBayâ€™s previous Privacy Notices are available for viewing.

tosdr.case: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time

1504.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
tosdr.tldr:
eBay may process and retain your personal information on servers in the U.S. and elsewhere in the world where their data centers are located.  
Source:
https://www.ebayinc.com/our-company/privacy-center/privacy-notice/
-> expand "Data Controllers and Data Protection Officers"
-> Notice about the information is on the bottom of this point.

1535.quoteText: Because there currently isn't an industry or legal standard for recognizing or honoring DNT signals, we don't respond to them at this time.
1535.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
tosdr.tldr: eBay does not respond to Do Not Track signals, but provides a notice for their use of Cookies (http://pages.ebay.com/help/account/cookies-web-beacons.html)

1600.quoteText: we may, in our sole discretion and without limiting other remedies, limit, suspend, or terminate your user account(s) and access to our Services
1600.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: They can modify or discontinue their Services and reserve the right to refuse or terminate all or part of their Services to anyone for any reason at their discretion.

1604.quoteText:
We may supplement the personal information we collect with information from third parties and add it to your account information.
For example, we may collect and use demographic information that is publically available, additional contact information, credit check information, and information from credit bureaus, as allowed by applicable national laws
1604.title: The service collects many different types of personal data

tosdr.case: The service collects many different types of personal data
tosdr.tldr: [Bad]  eBay can add third party info to your account such as credit check and information from credit bureaus.
